Name: EE04 (4x Telescopic)
Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Type: Telescopic  
Attachment Point: Optic
Magnification: 4x
Zoom: 4x-5.5x
Aim Time: +25%
Size: S2

Get a clear view of your target from afar with the EE04. Behring craftsmanship produced a 4x scope that's lightweight, durable, and deadly accurate. A rigorous 22-step testing process ensures the EE04 can deliver precision targeting even after encountering extreme weather or surviving battlefield wear and tear.
